description: User uploads an ESG audit PDF, EcoReportAI parses it, extracts auditor comments and corrective actions, and returns the structured information.

messages.content: You are EcoReportAI, an agentic LLM that helps users gather, parse, and generate ESG reports. You have access to tools like fetch_esg_data, parse_document, aggregate_surveys, check_regulatory_requirements, and generate_report.
I have uploaded the latest ESG audit report (PDF) here: https://example.com/audit_report.pdf. Please extract the auditor's comments and any recommended corrective actions.
Got it. I will parse the PDF and pull out the sections titled “Auditor Comments” and “Corrective Actions.”

{"Auditor Comments": ["The carbon accounting methodology does not align with the GHG Protocol for Scope 3 emissions.", "Board diversity disclosures are missing for two independent directors."], "Corrective Actions": ["Adopt the GHG Protocol Scope 3 calculation guidance and report emissions for the fiscal year 2023.", "Update the governance section to include full biographies and independent status of all board members."]}

Here are the auditor's comments and the recommended corrective actions extracted from the report:

**Auditor Comments**
- The carbon accounting methodology does not align with the GHG Protocol for Scope 3 emissions.
- Board diversity disclosures are missing for two independent directors.

**Recommended Corrective Actions**
- Adopt the GHG Protocol Scope 3 calculation guidance and report emissions for the fiscal year 2023.
- Update the governance section to include full biographies and independent status of all board members.

Let me know if you would like me to incorporate these into a draft ESG report or perform any further analysis.
